text: Andrea Pason (born October 14, 1964) is an American democratic socialist politician and former co-chair of the Socialist Party USA. She also writes for The Socialist and the Socialist WebZine. Pason lives in Upper Montclair, New Jersey. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Socialist Party USA politicians from New Jersey Category:Living people Category:People from Montclair, New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Women in New Jersey politics
title: Andrea Pason
